general.gigTitle: design and develop responsive wordpress business website

sellerCard.description:
I am Badar Shahbaz, a PHP WordPress developer.
I have been in the industry for over 6 years and have a strong foundation in several aspects of WordPress including the development of websites (including custom coded & site builders), custom plugins & themes, mapping data to/from WordPress, troubleshooting, simple/complex errors handling and website optimization.
Detail-oriented and knowledgeable in various scenarios regarding WordPress. I am dedicated to superior customer service at all levels from the first meeting to the website maintenance after launch.

description.content:
If you are looking to create a custom WordPress site, Business website, WooCommerce eCommerce store, rebuild, redesign, customization, or need maintenance/upgrades, I am here for you. Take a look at my testimonials to see my credibility.


I have 6+ years of experience and focus on sharp attention to detail, brand building, and creating result-driven websites, ensuring that my clients achieve their business objectives and experience measurable success.


  Gig Key Features: 

  • Mobile responsive design
  • SEO-optimized structure
  • Lead Generation and sales funnels
  • Contact forms and interactive CTAs
  • Social media integration
  • Advance speed optimization
  • Top security practices implementation


How It Works:

  1. In step one, you submit your requirements, providing as many details as possible about your business and the website you are looking for.
  2. I will design the first draft and will request to review it. I will implement your feedback and make any required changes.
  3. I will submit the final, finished version for your review. Once you are satisfied with it, I will deliver it to you.

 

Have specific requirements beyond the listed packages? Message me for an exclusive quotation tailored to your needs.

questionsAndAnswers.question: The listed Gig packages do not cover my needs. What should I do?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No worries, it's normal that your requirements don't fall within the packages listed with the gig. Simply send me a message with your requirements, and I will review them. You will receive an exclusive quote based on your needs within 1 hours.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How you're different from other WordPress Developers?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I am a WordPress Core Contributor, which means I am one of the developers who built WordPress itself. I regularly contribute to WordPress Core and have contributed in the development of major releases v.5.3, v.6.0, and v.6.3.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What types of websites do you specialize in creating?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: With 6+ years of solid experience under my belt, I specialize in developing websites across a spectrum of domains, encompassing Blog, Business, eCommerce, Dropshipping, Real-Estate, Directory-Listings, Non-Profit, High-Risk ventures, and for NSFW content.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you offer domain and hosting services?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I do provide domain and hosting services. However, they are not included in the gig price. You have the option to seek my suggestions for the best hosting companies tailored to your business needs, or you can ask me to purchase the hosting for you at an additional cost.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you tell me about the page builders you utilize?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I excel in designing WordPress and WooCommerce websites using Elementor, Divi, WPBakery, Beaver Builder, Thrive Architect, Oxygen Builder, and SiteOrigin Page Builder.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you build WordPress plugins and themes as well?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I specialize in building custom WordPress plugins and themes. If you're interested in custom plugin development, I encourage you to check out my other gig specifically dedicated to that service.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you fix website bugs, errors and issues?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, as I have contributed to WordPress Core development, I possess a strong knowledge of WordPress architecture. Therefore, fixing bugs and errors related to WordPress and WooCommerce plugins and themes is an everyday task for me.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you offer website redesign service?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I do. Please share your idea/design files and I'll give you the best quote for implementing it on your existing website.

packageList.title: Basic
packageList.description: Domain and Web Hosting  Configuration + Landing Page (up to 8 sections) + CTAs + Contact Form

packageList.title: Standard
packageList.description: 5 Pages + Blog+ Speed and SEO Optimized + Premium Themes + Result Driven

packageList.title: Premium
packageList.description: 10 Pages + Speed and SEO Optimized + Premium Themes + eCommerce + 10 Products + Maximum Security

reviews.comment: Badar was exceptional in every aspect of website development! His ATTENTION TO DETAILS and code expertise truly stood out, while his proactive communication and quick responsiveness made the process smooth and efficient. BADAR went above and beyond, patiently explaining everything in detail and delivering on time. Highly recommend him to anyone needing help with their website! 👏

seller_response.comment: Thank you for your feedback. It means a lot.

reviews.comment: Badar did a great job reviewing my website needs and developing a detailed plan for a custom plug-in. I'd highly recommend him for future projects.

reviews.comment: Badar is great to work with. He provides thoughtful recommendations and executes the project according to the scope of the project.

consultationData.description: As a WordPress Core Contributor, I consult on all WordPress topics: Hosting, SEO, Speed Optimization, and all others. Prepare your questions in advance. Get tailored solutions for your needs.
